verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
E
I have a holy passion
I have a hunger in my soul
To taste the fullness of His Spirit
To know Him more and more

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
So I will seek Your glory
And I will seek Your righteousness
The power of Your resurrection
Nothing more, and nothing less

verse.name: p1a
verse.lines:
When I am hungry,
You're the Bread that feeds me
When I am thirsty,
You bring water from the Rock

verse.name: p1b
verse.lines:
The hand that feeds me
is the hand that leads me
Beside still waters
to the table of His love

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Bread of Life, coming down from heaven
Come and fill this hunger in my soul
I want to taste the wine
You pour out for those who love You
Only You can satisfy!
Only You can satisfy!
